attributes.action: explain why his government has implemented the 'unnecessary programs' that he now plans to cut in order to ease pressure on public finances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Today, the Prime Minister said (inter alia) that he would ease the pressure on public finances by cutting 'unnecessary programs.' As a taxpayer, I want to know why the Prime Minister introduced these programs in the first place.
